name: mcp-workspace
description: Zurich Insurance UK test projects workspace containing multiple POCs and testing frameworks

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd atlassian-mcp-server && npm install --no-workspaces
scripts.build:all: npm run build:mcp && npm run build:java
scripts.build:java: echo 'Building Java projects...' && cd api-test-suite && mvn clean compile && cd ../zurich-spring-poc && mvn clean compile
scripts.clean: npm run clean:node && npm run clean:java
scripts.clean:java: cd api-test-suite && mvn clean && cd ../zurich-spring-poc && mvn clean

author: Zurich Insurance UK Development Team
